original_text: And he who is taken with the devoted things shall be burned with fire, he and all that he has, because he has transgressed the covenant of the Lord, and because he has done an outrageous thing in Israel.’”
korean_text: 온전히 바친 물건을 가진 자로 뽑힌 자를 불사르되 그와 그의 모든 소유를 그리하라 이는 여호와의 언약을 어기고 이스라엘 가운데에서 망령된 일을 행하였음이라 하셨다 하라

sentences.original_text: he who is taken with the devoted things
he and all that he has
because he has transgressed the covenant of the Lord
and because he has done an outrageous thing in Israel
